msbt.message: Seriously?!<10_4 /> Well, I'm flattered.I guess we should go talk to Resident Services to see what we can do!

Youyou still want me? Even after I turned you down and—Unless you've forgotten about that in which case there's no need to dredge up the past. Right? You know what? Let's do it.I could use a change of scenery and this island could certainly benefit from my branding expertise. Wish me luck at Resident Services!
Oh, , now I'm torn.I've got so much going on back homemy friends, my agent, my jam band I think I'm going to have to pass. But I hope you'll continue to treat me as a dignitary when I visit. Ha HA!

Whoa! You're actually inviting me to move here! Like, for real!Well, I'm humbled. And I'm flattered. But I haven't prepared a proper acceptance speech Ah, and I'm afraid I have to decline. I'm THIS CLOSE to hitting the big- time back home, . I can't walk away from that. But I'll be happy to come back and perform on anytime!

, that's really tempting. Like, incredibly tempting. But I can't give up the view I have back home. And my dreams of becoming the best at on my entire island. I'm THIS close to the top spot. Butmerci from the bottom of my corazón. Ha HA!

Well, that's an interesting proposal. Very interesting indeed.But what if we made it even MORE interesting. Ha HA!Let's play a quick card game. If you win, I'll move here. If I win, I won't.Are you ready for this?
Yeah!
I...don't know.

Ughthat's a really tempting offer, but it's too tough to make a decision like that all by myself. I've got a great idea Why don't we leave it up to fate? We'll play a card game to see what happens. If you win, I'll move here. If you losethen you'll just have to live without me somehow. Either way, we can sell the movie rights. It's a win-win! So, are we doing this?
Yeah!
Actually...nah.

Hmmmoving here could be just the brand refresh I've been looking for, but I really need to focus-group this. And there's no time to gather a select group of 18- to 49-year-olds! I know! Let's leave it up to chance! We'll play a card game. If you win, I'll move here right away. Ah, but if I win, then we'll know my fate lies elsewhere for now.Should we do this thing?
Sounds good to me!
Nah, never mind.
You gotta be sure, and that sounds a little wishy-washy to me. Maybe another time!
Aw, now you get cold feet? But this is the kind of everyday zazz I could bring to . Oh well.
Oh, so you're saying you'd rather scrap the whole plan altogether?<10_4 /> That's a shame.
Giddyup. Let's get started!
Well, it seems I've won our little game. I'm a little relieved. I hate moving.
, what a match! I guess that means I should cancel that mail-forwarding service
So I guess the move is off. Kinda puts a damper on my win.
At least we'll always have the memory of playing this super fun game I invented, .
Still, I've had a hoot on this island.I'm so glad I got the chance to live the lifestyle for a hot second.
But the goddess of fate has spoken. And you don't want to mess with her, . I'm just happy you invited me here in the first place. What a ride!
Well, that settles it.<10_4 /> I'm moving to !It's a weird way to make such an important life decision, but I've done weirder, . I better jet over to Resident Services and make this move official!
Congrats, you win! And I also win, because I get to move here! At least... I hope so. There are still a few i's to dot and t's to cross. I better make my way to Resident Services ASAP.

Wow, what a lucky run for you! Guess I better pack my bags, . For real, though. I'm fully planning on following through with this.Now, I hope you'll excuse me. I have to go beg the kind folks at Resident Services to let me live here!

I keep thinking about how I turned down your invite to live here, and to be honestit's eating away at me! Part of me wants you to invite me again, but another part of me is hesitant to make a big change. OK. Here's what we do. Play for it! If you win, I move to this island. If I win, I don't How does that sound, ?
OK!
I don't know...

You're still speaking to me? Even after I turned down your offer to live here Maybe I made the wrong call! I clearly can't be trusted with such a big decision. It's time fate stepped up and made the decision for me. Though fate hasn't always been kind to me No. We can't turn back now.We're deciding this with a card game! If you win, I move here. If I win, I don't. What do you think? I know. The stakes are high.
Let's do it.
Maybe too high...

I'm honored that you still want me to live here, butI'm still not sure it's the right move for me or my brand. If you have a deck of cards, I say we settle this right here, right now. Let's play a little game, OK? If you win, I move to this island. If I win, I remain a free agent. Should I deal you in?
Yep, deal me in!
I think I'll pass...
You gotta be sure, and that sounds a little wishy-washy to me. Maybe another time!
Aw, now you get cold feet? But this is the kind of everyday zazz I could bring to . Oh well.
Oh, so you're saying you'd rather scrap the whole plan altogether?<10_4 /> That's a shame.

Bad news, bud.I talked to Resident Services and the real estate sitch here is no bueno.There's actually no room left to build new houses, can you believe it? How could such a thing happen? Don't worry, though. I'm nothing if not a persistent .Are you alright with me negotiating with someone who already lives here for their spot?
Go for it!
I'd rather you didn't.
Ahh, I understand. You've got the place all set up the way you want it, . No problemo!

Great!I've been practicing legalese for a part in Lawyer: Attorney at Play anyway. Talk about synergy, ! Now, just tell me who you want to boot. Of coursewe could also take a softer approach and talk to residents who are looking to make a move. Resident Services gave me this list of folks who might be amenable.
, huh? Are you sure?
That's right.
No! Someone else!
I changed my mind.
Leave it to me! I'll head right over to and I'm playing hardball! Is hardball a sport? I thought it was called baseball for some reason.<10_4 /> Eh, .
Whoa! Good thing you stopped me before I got started. <10_4 />Alright, point me in the right direction!
Yeah? You seemed a little iffy about the whole thing. Let's pretend this never happened

Yep, I talked to and it turns out was about to move anyway. So now we can open up that artisanal shop together, ! Wait, I might have been talking about that with someone else. I've made so many plans already! Start over. I'm .<10_4 /> You're , right?I can't wait to move in and get this soon-to-be-legendary partnership going, !

I'm back! I went over to that house, and all I found were a few dust bunnies and tons of potential. I can't wait to give it what I call the treatment.Which is all to saymy move in is a go, . Let's do this.
If you're not sure about this, we don't have to do it.
Sorry, let me try again.
Let's not do it.
Alright, that's what I like to hear! Now, who should I go politely ask to leave the island?
Fair enough. Don't do anything you might regret later, .
Terrifico! Would you mind if I discuss the sitch with ?My sources at Resident Services assure me be happy to work something out with me.
Go for it!
Hold on...
Uh-oh. Did I say something wrong? Let's just put a pause on this whole scheme for now, . I don't want you going into it with any doubts, .

Oh HeySorry, I just got some bad news from Resident Services.The island is full-up! There's no more room—not even for celebrity invitees like me! Well, like my agent says constantly "You can't always get the part."But thanks anyway for the invite!

Oh HeySorry, I just got some bad news from Resident Services.The island is full up and there are no plots of land for sale!Where would I even build the humble four-story castle of my dreams?Well, like my agent says constantly "You can't always get the part." But thanks anyway for the invite!

Guess whatYou're looking at the latest celebrity addition to !That's right, Resident Services said I am cleared for landing. The S.S. is touching down! And it's all thanks to you, uh , right? I really owe you one, .

OK, here's the scoop. I went to Resident Services and told them who I wasAnd they said, "OF COURSE you can move here, ! An open spot is ready for you!"I don't normally like to use my star power like that, but this just feels right, . Uh, your name IS , isn't it?
So that's the sitchbut I'm game to try again.The next time might just be the "OK" time, yeah, ?
You're so right!
I'm not sure...
I get that The world can be an unsure place, .
I can't believe your is so popular. It almost makes me NOT want to move here Nah, who am I kidding. I'm desperate to move here!
I can't believe your island is so popular. It almost makes me NOT want to move here Nah, who am I kidding. I'm desperate to move here!So let me know the minute another plot of land goes up for sale.
This island has a chill vibe. I could get my chi unscrambled here, my feng all shui'd up, .
So why don't you?
Thank you!

I've definitely thought about itbut I want to take things slow, get to know the island better first, . For now, I'll let absence make my heart grow fonder, so I'll be happier if—no, WHEN you invite me back!
Yeah, this really is a paradise for all living creatures, great and small.
Time passes slower on this island. Feels like this would be a powerful place for soul-searching meditation
So move here, then!
Thank you!

Your invitation makes me happy, but I don't think I'm ready for that type of commitment yet.I'd want to truly understand the deeper meaning of the name "" first So how about you just invite me back here sometime and we'll take it from there?
I'm the one who should be thanking you. I got to spend some meaningful, reinvigorating time here!
